objects.specification: A smooth light colored vinyl floor with a slight texture to resemble educational building styling, durable and uniform across the classroom, finished in a soft off-white tone.
A smooth painted front wall surface in a bright, warm neutral color with flat finish, designed to support mounted teaching aids and fixtures.
A smooth painted back wall surface in a bright, warm neutral color with flat finish, optimal for mounting learning charts and decorative elements.
A smooth painted side wall surface in a bright, neutral tone, providing space for storage units and wall decorations.
A smooth painted side wall surface in a bright, neutral tone, featuring a large window and additional visual elements.
A large rectangular teacher’s desk with a rich dark wood finish, sturdy solid construction, built-in modest storage drawers on one side and clean minimalist lines that convey professional elegance.
An ergonomic office chair with a padded seat and backrest upholstered in charcoal grey fabric, featuring adjustable height and a five-star base for comfortable teacher use.
A rectangular wall-mounted whiteboard with a sleek aluminum frame and a smooth glossy writing surface, complete with an integrated marker tray.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector in matte white finish with subtle ventilation grills and a forward-facing lens for classroom presentations.
A classic round wall clock with a clean modern design, white dial, bold black hour markers and hands, and a slim matte frame.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes, a thin metallic frame, and soft pastel curtains on either side to allow natural light.
A tall bookshelf unit in a warm wood tone with multiple adjustable shelves filled with colorful books and binders, featuring a simple backing and clean lines.
A tall bookshelf unit in a warm wood tone with multiple adjustable shelves filled with colorful books and binders, featuring a simple backing and clean lines.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a medium-sized ceramic pot, adding a fresh atmosphere to the corner.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a medium-sized ceramic pot, adding a fresh atmosphere to the corner.
A small round waste bin in durable neutral-tone plastic with a flip-top lid, placed conveniently near the teacher’s desk.
A small round waste bin in durable neutral-tone plastic with a flip-top lid, placed near the back of the classroom.
An educational poster with colorful graphics and informative content, laminated paper texture and mounted with a thin frame to enhance learning.
An educational poster with colorful graphics and informative content, laminated paper texture and mounted with a thin frame to enhance learning.
An educational poster with colorful graphics and informative content, laminated paper texture and mounted with a thin frame to enhance learning.
An educational poster with colorful graphics and informative content, laminated paper texture and mounted with a thin frame to enhance learning.
A modern rectangular ceiling light fixture with a diffused panel, matte white finish and edge-lit LED design for even bright illumination.
A modern rectangular ceiling light fixture with a diffused panel, matte white finish and edge-lit LED design for even bright illumination.
A modern rectangular ceiling light fixture with a diffused panel, matte white finish and edge-lit LED design for even bright illumination.
A modern rectangular ceiling light fixture with a diffused panel, matte white finish and edge-lit LED design for even bright illumination.
A rectangular student desk with a light wood grain finish, gently rounded edges, slender matte black metal legs, a smooth flat surface, and minimalistic Scandinavian styling.
A student chair with a molded plastic seat in a complementary soft grey tone, supportive curved backrest, powder-coated metal frame, stackable form and comfortable proportions.
